org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.server

Class WebSocketServerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
      • org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.ContainerLifeCycle
        • org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.server.WebSocketServerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Container, Destroyable, Dumpable, LifeCycle, SessionListener, WebSocketCreator, WebSocketServletFactory

    public class WebSocketServerFactory
extends ContainerLifeCycle
implements WebSocketCreator, WebSocketServletFactory, SessionListener
    Factory to create WebSocket connections

        public void register(Class<?> websocketPojo)
        Description copied from interface: WebSocketServletFactory

        Note: only required if using the default WebSocketCreator provided by this factory.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
